ygData.subject: Re: concerning the spells..
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, that was darn nice of you, i must admit i think this list is a great idea, it was my understanding that the shadowknight was to be a knockoff of the
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, that was darn nice of you, i must admit i think this list is a great
idea,

it was my understanding that the shadowknight was to be a knockoff of the
anti-paladin in the AD&D world and if it is, then it is a bad one, the AP is
so much more powerfull then we are, it isnt even funny, first there is the
aura around him that causes fright, because he is sooooo damn ugly, he also
later in life has the opertunity to summon the great dark reaver, or a
nightmare to ride, i mean it has been a long time, since i played ad&d but i
still remember my favorit class, and this was gonna be a good knock off
......hehe right,

but it is still fun to play,
Phrite
